release.notes: D1 Added new color fixer for console. D2 Added some error reports changed longpluginname to colorful_console config version changed to 1.0.14 D3 Removed Birthday Message code. Please accept my apologies.

developer.notes: D1 Removed extra period in key for toggledebug command, that caused an NPE. Fixed chance configs. D2 Added missing language keys/values for /dde toggledebug, command. D3 Added the other two missing keys.
